title: Christmas With Eve
description: TWAS THE NIGHT BEFORE CHRISTMAS...And all through the inn, not a creature was stirring.... Except normally uptight college prof Eve Vaughn and the gorgeous sexy stranger she'd met. They were sharing the most passionate night of their lives together. In the morning Eve would sneak away, determined not to see him again.Fate? Kismet? Max couldn't explain his hard and fast feelings for Eve. She was a special gift he'd enjoyed unwrapping in the privacy of her bedroom. A gift he had no intention of giving up on Christmas morn!
author: Elda Minger
